author: chetanm
msg: OAK-3367 - Boosting fields not working as expected
Allow any nodeScopeIndex and analyzed field to be used. This would allow better results without going for boost as search across a small field jcr:title would lead to high score

author: markt
msg: Add a web application class loader implementation that supports the parallel loading of web application classes.
Use of this feature requires a Java 7 or later JRE.
Based on a patch by Huxing Zhang.
